headline: Ask HN: How to negotiate contract details Amazon (specifics in post)
description:
Some context: I have negotiated b2b contracts for businesses, as well as contracts for work in the past; but I have never ventured father than pushing back on a non compete, or benefits of some kind.

I am interested in the following areas/I don't have experience in the below:

* Being able to do (unrelated) consulting work via an SCORP while employed at Amazon. * Being able to work on a game while working at Amazon as if I didn't work at Amazon (licensing). * Continuing to contribute to FOSS projects

All of the above are obviously off company time and hardware.

I am searching for and reading previous posts on these topics; but would appreciate any links to previous discussions on this, or direct feedback from FANNG employees.

What would you have done differently in the above areas? At what point in the hiring process should I be pushing for the above? If these are unrealistic, is there a middle ground I can shoot for?

Once again thanks for sharing your time/experience.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何谈判合同细节 亚马逊（具体内容见后文）
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何談判合同細節 亞馬遜（具體內容見後文）
description_zh-Hans:
一些背景。我曾经为企业谈判过B2B合同，以及过去的工作合同；但我从来没有冒险过，除了在不竞争上推倒重来，或者是某种好处。

我对以下方面感兴趣/我没有以下方面的经验：

*能够在亚马逊工作时通过SCORP做（不相关）咨询工作。 *能够在亚马逊工作时从事游戏工作，就像我没有在亚马逊工作一样（许可）。

上述所有内容显然都是在公司时间和硬件之外进行的。

我正在搜索和阅读以前关于这些主题的帖子；但如果有任何关于这方面的讨论链接，或FANNG员工的直接反馈，我将不胜感激。

在上述领域，你会采取什么不同的做法？ 在招聘过程中，我应该在哪个阶段推动上述工作？ 如果这些都是不现实的，是否有一个我可以争取的中间地带？

再次感谢您分享您的时间/经验。
